jminusminus

Class TokenInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • jminusminus.TokenInfo

  • class TokenInfo
extends Object
    A representation of tokens returned by the lexical analyzer method, getNextToken. A token has a kind identifying what kind of token it is, an image for providing any semantic text, and the line in which it occurred in the source file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TokenInfo(TokenKind kind, int line)
      Constructs a TokenInfo given its kind and its line number.
      TokenInfo(TokenKind kind, String image, int line)
      Constructs a TokenInfo given its kind, the semantic text forming the token, and its line number.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String image()
      Returns the semantic text associated with the token.
      TokenKind kind()
      Returns the token's kind.
      int line()
      Returns the line number associated with the token.
      String tokenRep()
      Returns the token's string representation.
      String toString()
      Returns the token's image.

                 int line)
        Constructs a TokenInfo given its kind, the semantic text forming the token, and its line number.
        Parameters:
        kind - the token's kind.
        image - the semantic text comprising the token.
        line - the line in which the token occurs in the source file.

      • TokenInfo

        public TokenInfo(TokenKind kind,
                 int line)
        Constructs a TokenInfo given its kind and its line number. Its image is simply its string representation.
        Parameters:
        kind - the token's identifying number.
        line - identifying the line on which the token was found.
